Room.Name: Collapsed Concourse
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a low and narrow part of a collapsed hall, in Castle Kayleigh.
Room.LongDescription: A gentle rush of air comes from the broken wall, and you can see the hellish acid filled moat outside. There is no apparent way across it, as the draw- bridge was burned during the battle. The acid makes your eyes water and your throat burn. This is not a pleasant place.
